plot: A mother learns of a plot against the life of her son, a prosecuting attorney. She decides to take pre-emptive action and kills the would-be murderer. Now she finds herself facing charges of premeditated murder.
title: Adeului shimpan
plot_es: A mother learns of a plot against the life of her son, a prosecuting attorney. She decides to take pre-emptive action and kills the would-be murderer. Now she finds herself facing charges of premeditated murder.
plot_en: A mother learns of a plot against the life of her son, a prosecuting attorney. She decides to take pre-emptive action and kills the would-be murderer. Now she finds herself facing charges of premeditated murder.
